q1.question: How can I cancel my order?
q1.answer: You can cancel your order from the 'My Orders' section before the status changes to 'Preparing'. Orders that have been shipped cannot be cancelled.

q2.question: How does the product return process work?
q2.answer: You can return your products within 14 days. After creating a return request from My Account > My Orders, you can send the product free of charge using the provided tracking code.

q3.question: How much is the shipping cost?
q3.answer: Shipping is free for all orders. There is no minimum order requirement.

q4.question: What payment methods can I use?
q4.answer: You can pay with credit card, debit card, and PayPal. We also offer cash on delivery option.

support.title: Support
support.whatsapp_message: Hello, I would like to get help about Metropolitan Food Group.

faq.delivery_question: How does the shipping process work?
faq.delivery_answer: Your orders are shipped within 1-3 business days after confirmation. Your tracking number is sent via SMS.
faq.payment_question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.payment_answer: You can pay with credit card, debit card, and bank transfer/EFT. We offer invoiced payment for corporate customers.
faq.return_question: What are the return and exchange conditions?
faq.return_answer: You can return your products within 14 days from the delivery date, provided they are unopened and unused.
faq.cancel_question: How can I cancel my order?
faq.cancel_answer: You can cancel from the My Orders section before your order is shipped. For shipped orders, please contact customer service.

support.help_center_desc: We are here to provide you with the best service. Don't hesitate to contact us whenever you have questions.

errors.RATE_LIMIT_SEARCH: Too many search requests. Please slow down.
